name: P2B â€” Place From Schematic
description: Maps schematic symbol positions to PCB footprints with collision-free closest-fit placement and an optional optimiser.
description_full: KiCad 9 action plugin providing a modeless GUI to project schematic positions onto PCB footprints. Includes auto/slider scale, selection filtering, rotation import, collision-free closest-fit placement, and a fast local optimiser to minimise placement error.
